item.title: Nora add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Animals are my friends...and I don't eat my friends." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Nora add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nora add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Of all the animals, man is the only one that is cruel. He is the only one that inflicts pain for the pleasure of doing it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nora add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Nora add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Nora add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Nora add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "It's a match made in heaven...by a retarded angel." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Nora add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "The difference between sex and love is that sex relieves tension and love causes it." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Nora add a quote by Cary Grant
item.description: "I began by acting like the person I wanted to be, and eventually I became that person." -- Cary Grant

item.title: Nora add a quote by Cary Grant
item.description: "Everyone wants to be Cary Grant. Even I want to be Cary Grant." -- Cary Grant

item.title: Nora add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Nora add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Nora add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Nora add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Nora add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Nora add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Nora add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Nora add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Living is Easy with Eyes Closed." -- John Lennon

item.title: Nora add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Nora add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "War is over ... If you want it." -- John Lennon

item.title: Nora add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Nora add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "God is a concept by which we measure our pain." -- John Lennon

item.title: Nora add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nora add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Nora add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Nora add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Nora add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Nora add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Nora add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Nora add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa
